body_html:
@bstriner

https://github.com/bstriner/tensorflow/blob/2fa2407ca68e24f3a9aed885ae420de932640264/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/CMakeLists.txt#L2

tensorflow require CMake at least 3.5, no worry about CMake 2.

I'd like to create PR for my refactoring, but it needs more testing. Building tensorflow once take too long.

body:
@bstriner

https://github.com/bstriner/tensorflow/blob/2fa2407ca68e24f3a9aed885ae420de932640264/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/CMakeLists.txt#L2

tensorflow require CMake at least 3.5, no worry about CMake 2.

I'd like to create PR for my refactoring, but it needs more testing. Building tensorflow once take too long.
